frameDefinitions: A Cognizer_agent attempts to find some Sought_entity by examining some Ground.
An Assailant physically attacks a Victim (which is usually but not always sentient), causing or intending to cause the Victim physical damage.
A Hunter tries to gain Food by way of outsmarting or tracking a living.
An Event begins at a certain Time and Place.
This frame concerns a Cognizer (a person or other intelligent being) paying close attention to something, the Ground, in order to discover and note its salient characteristics.
A Searcher looks all over a Ground in order to find a Sought_entity.
frameExamples: As soon as he stepped out of the bar he was <t>set</t> upon by four men in ski-masks.
In the Congo, he hunted big game for the first time.
We <t>searched</t> the yard  for my contact lens.
The newcomers <t>combed</t> the area looking for minerals
listRoleDefinitions: The person who attempts to find the Sought_entity.
This is the entity that the <fen>Ground</fen> may contain. Typically, it is expressed as a <ment>for</ment>-PP.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the Seeking occurs.
A spatial setting larger than the <fen>Ground</fen> in which the Seeking event occurs.
This role is the being or entity that is injured by the <fen>Assailant</fen>'s attack.
The person (or other self-directed entity) that is attempting physical harm to the <fen>Victim</fen>.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Assailant</fen> attacks the <fen>Victim</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Assailant</fen> makes an assault on the <fen>Victim</fen>.
The <fen>Hunter</fen> is the agent hoping to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
<fen>Food</fen> is the sought-out item by the <fen>Hunter</fen>.
This is the entity to which the <fen>Hunter</fen> pays attention. It is referred to as <fen>Ground</fen> because it serves as the background or context for the <fen>Food</fen>.
When the <fen>Time</fen> seeking action occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Hunter</fen> attempts to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
Name of the <fen>Event</fen> which occurs.
When the <fen>Event</fen> occurs.
Where the <fen>Event</fen> takes place.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> pays attention to an entity in order to discover something about it. The role is normally expressed as an External Argument:

The <fen>Cognizer</fen> pays attention to the <fen>Ground</fen>, so named because it serves as the background or context for the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>. This role can be expressed as an NP Object or as a PP Complement.

The <fen>Medium</fen> is the piece of text or work in which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> pays attention to an entity in order to discover something about it. The role is normally expressed as an External Argument:
An entity directed by the <fen>Cognizer</fen>  that interacts with the <fen>Ground</fen> to accomplish the scrutiny.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is scrutinizing the <fen>Ground</fen>.
The person who is looking all over the <fen>Ground</fen> for the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
The location that the <fen>Searcher</fen> covers in looking for the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
The entity that the <fen>Searcher</fen> wants to find.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Searcher</fen> scoures the <fen>Ground</fen>.
listRoleExamples: The police were hunting for evidence in my house <fex>yesterday</fex>
<fex>In Paris</fex> police were hunting for suspects in two of the city's southerns suburbs today
The mysterious fighter attacked <fex>the guardsmen</fex> with a sabre.
<fex>The mysterious fighter</fex> attacked the guardsmen with a sabre.
<fex>As soon as he stepped out of the bar</fex> he was set upon by four men in ski-masks.
Then Jon-O's forces ambushed them <fex>on the left flank</fex> from a line of low hills.
<fex>Chapter four</fex> examined the case for free speech.
The temperature controller monitored the temperature <fex>with a calibrated silicon diode</fex>.
<fex>They</fex> first gained entry into the house of Raja Rao, who resides on the ground floor and ransacked the house for valuables.
I had never really seen much on the bigfoot subject or I would have scoured <fex>the area</fex> for signs and looked for droppings
Coast Guard and Navy ships and aircraft combed the area <fex>for the six aircraft</fex>

sourceCandidateSpans.text: The Royal Regiment of Electrical and Mechanical Engineers
